post:
Just a quick forum post to let you know about our new September 2011 VPS Special. This time, we are having a Xen PV blowout!  

10GB RAID Disk  
256MB RAM + 256MB SWAP  
750GB Bandwidth  
FREE 5GB Offsite FTP Space  
UK-Based  
**FULLY MANAGED**   
1 IPv4 + 16 IPv6

A few notes about this special:  
 - It is based on Xen PV for guaranteed zero overselling  
 - It is 100% fully managed and cPanel/DirectAdmin are available as addons  
 - Open a ticket after order for your FREE 5GB backup space  
 - This special is not instant setup. These VPSs will be deployed in batches as we get new servers online. Your billing date will be adjusted accordingly.  
 - IRC, torrents and proxies are allowed for legal use

Price: £25 per year, including VAT!  

Order link: https://www.qualityservers.co.uk/cp/cart.php?a=add&pid=153
